name: HG Customizer
description:
Before you can install this style, you have to get the add-on "Stylus" or a similar userstyle manager:
Firefox, Chrome Click here to download Autocropper or Hosthelper. New: Click here for a masked GIMP template to create smooth blending backgrounds. Simply select each layer and copypaste your image in it. Blending and resolution are done automatically. Uploading your own images takes extremely long, so it is recommended to put the link to an URL instead!
